name: Eagle Street Rooftop Farm
description: This 6,000 square foot organic vegetable farm is located atop a warehouse rooftop.  The farm delivers bicycle-fresh produce to area restaurants, and runs educational programs through GrowingChefs.org. Stop by for their weekly farmers market.
